ready2work.title: Ready2Work
ready2work.description: Ready2Work: a social initiative by MentaPixel. It's an innovative platform designed to efficiently and effectively connect companies with developers. Through a unique matching system, we create work teams composed of specialists with complementary skills, adapted to the specific needs of each project.

step1.title: Task Registration
step1.description: The company registers a task specifying the required skills.

step2.title: Filtering and Selection
step2.description: Our system filters and selects developers who possess these skills and forms a team.

step3.title: Team Formation
step3.description: A partner or team with complementary skills is created.

step4.title: Project Management
step4.description: A MentaPixel project manager is assigned.

differentiator.title: How is Ready2Work different from other platforms?
differentiator.point1: By assembling development teams with complementary skills, the positive completion of the project is ensured. MentaPixel handles project management, freeing up the company's workload.
differentiator.point2: After completing the project, companies could directly hire the developer. MentaPixel assumes responsibility for the development and satisfactory completion of the project, representing 100% security in completion, with no risk for the company.

faas.title: Freelancer as a Service (FaaS)
faas.description: FaaS (Freelancer as a Service) is not a network of freelancers, but a consolidated work team with more than four years of experience working together. Our model adapts to the growth and needs of each client, strategically expanding the team according to project requirements. We always maintain direct control of both the team and the tasks and projects in-house, ensuring efficient management without resorting to subcontracting or outsourcing.
